karsabi-alpha-class-star-wing-squadron-l.name: Alpha Class Star Wing Squadron
nicknames: Alpha Class Star Wing Squadron Legends
karsabi-alpha-class-star-wing-squadron-l.ability: While attacking a ship, if there is at least 1 friendly unengaged squadron with BOMBER within distance 1 of you, you may add a red die to your attack pool.

corran-horn-e-wing-squadron-new-republic.author: Armada Legends
corran-horn-e-wing-squadron-new-republic.name: E-wing Squadron {NR}
corran-horn-e-wing-squadron-new-republic.ability: Once per round, after you perform an attack, you may spend a defense token to perform an additional attack against the same target using an anti-squadron armament of 2 blue dice.

gavin-darklighter-e-wing-squadron-new-re.author: Armada Legends
gavin-darklighter-e-wing-squadron-new-re.name: E-wing Squadron {NR}
gavin-darklighter-e-wing-squadron-new-re.ability: After an enemy squadron at distance 1-2 of you suffers damage, you may spend a readied defense token. If you do, the defender suffers 1 damage.

luke-skywalker-e-wing-squadron-new-repub.author: Armada Legends
luke-skywalker-e-wing-squadron-new-repub.name: E-wing Squadron {NR}
luke-skywalker-e-wing-squadron-new-repub.ability: Once per activation, while attacking, you may spend a die with an :accuracy: icon to add one die of any color to the attack pool.

miranda-doni-k-wing-squadron-new-republi.author: Armada Legends
miranda-doni-k-wing-squadron-new-republi.name: K-Wing Squadron {NR}
miranda-doni-k-wing-squadron-new-republi.ability: While performing a non-COUNTER attack against a squadron, you may roll 1 fewer die to recover 1 hull, or you may suffer 1 damage to add 1 blue die to the attack pool.

luke-skywalker-x-wing-squadron-new-repub.author: Armada Legends
luke-skywalker-x-wing-squadron-new-repub.name: X-Wing Squadron {NR}
luke-skywalker-x-wing-squadron-new-repub.ability:
When attacking a ship, treat the defender as having no shields.
During your activation, you may spend 1 defense token to attack ships while you are engaged with enemy squadrons.

tycho-celchu-x-wing-squadron-new-republi.author: Armada Legends
tycho-celchu-x-wing-squadron-new-republi.name: X-Wing Squadron {NR}
tycho-celchu-x-wing-squadron-new-republi.ability: When a friendly squadron with ESCORT at distance 1 is declared as the target of an attack, you may spend 1 defense token to treat the attack as obstructed.

wedge-antilles-x-wing-squadron-new-repub.author: Armada Legends
wedge-antilles-x-wing-squadron-new-repub.name: X-Wing Squadron {NR}
wedge-antilles-x-wing-squadron-new-repub.ability: While attacking an activated squadron, if the defender is engaged with another friendly squadron with ESCORT, you may add 2 blue dice to the attack pool.
